title: Calories in Auntie Anne's Pretzel
meta_description: Discover calories in auntie annes pretzel, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and variations like dips or flavors.
assumptions: Standard original soft pretzel (about 115 g), fresh-baked, salted topping, no dips or additional flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, size, and customizations; check Auntie Anne's app or site for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Auntie Anne's soft pretzel has ~280 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add sweet glaze dip (1 oz serving)
Mini pretzel bites (10 pieces equivalent to 1 full)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: Approximately 280 kcal for the original soft pretzel.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: About 700 mg per pretzel, mainly from the salt topping.

faqs.q: Are Auntie Anne's pretzels high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, around 51 g carbs per pretzel, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Calories in Auntie Anne's with cheese dip?
faqs.a: Adds ~100 kcal; total ~380 kcal depending on dip amount.

faqs.q: How much protein in an Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: Roughly 9 g protein per standard pretzel.
